string-array.name: info
string-array.item:
How does Liquid Parts work?
This application changes the system settings. If you want use it you need to get root rights.

Who was developing application?
The first developer was Suxsem, then Thepasto continued development. The developer of this version of the app - RomzesRover

What could this application?
• Edit sensivity for touchscreen and for softkeys
• Edit noise for touchscreen
• Turn on/off Haptick Feedback
• Edit vibration strenght for softkeys
• Turn on/off swap
• Edit swappiness
• edit sdCardReadAhead

Sensivity and Noise
The smaller the value of the sensitivity and the noise that operates responsive screen. Caution: too low values can result to false positives.

What is Swapinness
This is the technology transfer of RAM to swap. A value of 0 will give greater responsiveness and less free memory. A value of 100 will give more memory, but the system will slow down.

If settings can\'t apply
• Try to check does you grant superuser rights to this app
• Try to restart this app

After applying new settings touch become crazy
• Try to return the settings to default
• Make a system wipe
• Flash stock rom from 2.1 or 2.2

RomzesRover: (current developer)
• PayPal: romzesrover@gmail.com
• Yandex money: 41001630559136
• Play market:
